keyMoments.title: Jinbe's Anime Debut as the Imprisoned Warlord
keyMoments.description: Jinbe is revealed as the Warlord imprisoned in Level 6 alongside Ace, refusing to fight in the war against Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Jinbe in the anime, establishing him as a principled warrior loyal to Whitebeard.
keyMoments.quote: I cannot accept death. I don't care if I lose my title as Warlord of the Sea, but I only want to prevent this war.

keyMoments.title: Jinbe's Debt to Whitebeard Explained
keyMoments.description: Jinbe explains how Whitebeard protected Fish-Man Island from slavers, giving the island peace and safety.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Jinbe's deep gratitude and loyalty to Whitebeard, explaining his refusal to fight.
keyMoments.quote: Many Fish-Men and Mermaids were captured and sold, but then Whitebeard appeared saying that the island belongs to him now.

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Labeled as 'Pirate-Hating Pirate'
keyMoments.description: Jinbe reveals his reputation as a 'pirate-hating pirate' while admitting his genuine friendship with Whitebeard's crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the complexity of Jinbe's character and his independent moral code.
keyMoments.quote: The World Government calls me a 'pirate-hating pirate' much to everyone's surprise. But I spent a lot of time on Whitebeard's ship and I admit I like those guys.

bounties.reason: Former bounty as captain of the Sun Pirates before becoming a Warlord

abilities.description: A powerful martial art practiced by fish-men that manipulates water.

relationships.description: Jinbe fought Ace for five days before they became friends. He deeply respects Ace and wants to save him from execution.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe explains to Ace why he's trying to prevent the war and save both Ace and Whitebeard.

reveals.information: Revealed to be the imprisoned Warlord in Level 6 of Impel Down
Owes a debt to Whitebeard for protecting Fish-Man Island from slavers
Refused to fight in the war against Whitebeard, leading to his imprisonment
Called a 'pirate-hating pirate' by the World Government

keyMoments.title: The Sphinx Guardian Appears
keyMoments.description: The Sphinx, guardian of Level 2, confronts Luffy, Buggy, and Galdino. It can only speak in names of noodles.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of Impel Down's memorable guardian creatures with its unique quirk.

keyMoments.title: Falling to Level 3
keyMoments.description: The Sphinx destroys the floor, causing everyone including itself to fall to Level 3.
keyMoments.significance: Inadvertently helps Luffy's group progress deeper into Impel Down.

abilities.description: Can only communicate using names of various noodle dishes.
Powerful enough to break through the floor of Level 2.

reveals.information: Can only speak in noodle names due to mimicking prisoners' words without understanding

keyMoments.title: Doha Ittanka II Appears in Level 6
keyMoments.description: Doha Ittanka II is shown as one of the massive prisoners in Level 6, expressing violent intentions toward Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the caliber of legendary criminals imprisoned in Eternal Hell.

reveals.information: Imprisoned in Level 6 (Eternal Hell) of Impel Down

keyMoments.title: Falling to Level 3
keyMoments.description: Luffy falls through the floor to Level 3 after the Sphinx destroys it.
keyMoments.significance: Progresses deeper into Impel Down on his mission to save Ace.

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Learns of Jinbe's Debt to Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: Ace listens as Jinbe explains Whitebeard's protection of Fish-Man Island and his reasons for refusing to fight.
keyMoments.significance: Deepens Ace's understanding of how far Whitebeard's influence and kindness extends.

relationships.description: Ace and Jinbe fought for five days before becoming friends. They are imprisoned together in Level 6.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe explains his motivations to Ace, deepening their bond as cellmates.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Rallies Level 6 Prisoners
keyMoments.description: Crocodile expresses his desire to kill Whitebeard, rallying other prisoners with his words about not missing the chance to kill legends.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Crocodile still has ambitions and influence even while imprisoned.
keyMoments.quote: How many people will hold back their tears if they didn't get the chance to kill Roger or Whitebeard?

reveals.information: Desires to kill Whitebeard and considers him on the same legendary level as Gol D. Roger
